ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}

bookSourceComment:
这个版本是和番茄小说标题同步的！部分小说改过名字，封面和介绍刷新会有不同，如果有刚好遇到过建议重新加入书架！
这个版本已经尽量完善了，比如分类也从别的同源移植完善！部分番茄小说改过名字的这个新版旧版标题搜索的到，但是建议有新版标题请选择新版，不然介绍标题和封面不同步！
已知bug还有
1.部分小说名字借助作者关键找不到，请输入完成的书名！
目前搞不定，也不影响使用！
2022.9.16
由于最近那个免登入，无法直接用登入账号继续观看正文，本次版本已经把  正文规则和章节 URL 规则从旧版的替换回去了，目前可以继续借助登入账号继续使用！其他规则保留前天修复版的规则！
2022.9.23
最新免登入修复版！
1.除了替换新版的修复规则外，搜到地址规则替换新版了！如果想换回去，可以从第五版（纪念版获取！）其他保留规则不变！
2022.9.24
1.目录加入时间了（前面的时间不一定准确，最近更新绝对同步，样本参考爱阅源）
2022.10.2
1.简介上的标题异常修复
2.搜索能显示目录名字和更新时间
2022.12.08
修复部分搜索默认首页搜索不到书籍！（比如：明月云 ）
2023.1.27
搜索规则替换新版，已经尽量让其他懂搜索到，和封面和详细书名对齐，如果再有异常找人修吧！

  function spArr(arr, num) {
    let newArr = []
	   for (let i = 0; i < arr.length;) {
		    newArr.push(arr.slice(i, i += num));
    }
	   return newArr
  }
  let array = []

  let res = JSON.parse(result)
  let item_list = spArr(res.data.allItemIds,100)
  let page = item_list.length;
  for(i=0;i<page;i++) {
    let response = java.ajax('https://api5-normal-lq.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/directory/all_infos/v/?item_ids=' + item_list[i] + '&iid=2718442795830583&aid=1967&version_code=290');
    let data=JSON.parse(response).data;
    data.forEach((x)=>{    	if(JSON.stringify(v).indexOf(x.volume_name)==-2){
    	array.push({
    		name:'📖['+x.volume_name+']📖',
    		isVolume:true
    		});
    				
    			 v.push(x.volume_name)
    			 }
          array.push({
            name: x.title,
           info: '更新时间: ' + java.timeFormat(x.first_pass_time*1000) +'.' + x.chapter_word_number + '字', url:'https://novel.snssdk.com/api/novel/book/reader/full/v1/?group_id=' + x.item_id+'&item_id='+x.item_id+'&aid=2022'
         })
    })
  }
  array

<js>
  function spArr(arr, num) {
    let newArr = []
	   for (let i = 0; i < arr.length;) {
		    newArr.push(arr.slice(i, i += num));
    }
	   return newArr
  }
  let array = []
    let v = []
  let res = JSON.parse(result)
  let item_list = spArr(res.data.allItemIds,100)
  let page = item_list.length;
  for(i=0;i<page;i++) {
    let response = java.ajax('https://api5-normal-lq.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/directory/all_infos/v/?item_ids=' + item_list[i] + '&iid=2718442795830583&aid=1967&version_code=290');
    let data=JSON.parse(response).data;
    data.forEach((x)=>{    	if(JSON.stringify(v).indexOf(x.volume_name)==-1){
    	array.push({
    		isVolume:true
    		});
    				
    			 v.push(x.volume_name)
    			 }
          array.push({
            name: x.title,
            url:'https://novel.snssdk.com/api/novel/book/reader/full/v1/?group_id=' + x.item_id+'&item_id='+x.item_id+'&aid=1977'
      })
    })
  }
  array
</js>

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();

    Packages.java.lang,

);

with(javaImport){
  function encode(word){
      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("EP99Mjk5Bc5jInLnKfUgRaOo0oZmUANFRDmyf05uTx8="),"AES");
      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      chipher.init(1,key,iv);
      return java.encodeURI(Base64.encodeToString(chipher.doFinal(String(word).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP));
    }
}

ruleBookInfo.author: .author
ruleBookInfo.kind: {{$..category}},连载{{$..creation_status}}完结,{{$..score}}分,{{$..create_time##T.*}}@js:result.replace(/连载0完结/g,'完结').replace(/连载1完结/g,'连载').replace(/连载4完结/g,'已断更').replace(/连载-1完结/g,'完结')
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter: {{$..last_chapter_title##小说：}}<js>##正文卷.|正文.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|卷_|VIP章节.|免费章节.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求更票谢乐发订合补加架字修Kk].*?[】）\)]</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: .book_name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.kind: {{$.category}},{{$.source}},连载{{$.creation_status}}完结,{{$.score}}分,{{$.create_time##T.*}}@js:result.replace(/连载0完结/g,'完结').replace(/连载1完结/g,'连载').replace(/连载4完结/g,'已断更').replace(/连载-1完结/g,'完结')
